long_description: Mostly cotton with a little stretch, the Isis Gemma Halter Dress features a built-in bra and flattering silhouette to keep you feeling and looking good on all your warm-weather travels. 90% cotton/10% spandex fabric stretches nicely, breathes, and resists wrinkles. Simple elastic halter neck allows a perfect fit without having to fuss with ties. Closeout.
short_description: Mostly cotton with a little stretch, the Isis Gemma Halter Dress features a built-in bra and flattering silhouette to keep you feeling and looking good on all your warm-weather travels.
